Hi,

I'm aware that this issue is eclipse specific and only indirectly
rela=
ted to JUnit but I thought there might be someone lurking on this
list that=
 has run into the same issue that I currently have:

I'm trying to run a JU=
nit 4.4 based runner (Bumblebee) under a
plugintest in eclipse. It turns ou=
t that eclipse 3.3 (and even 3.4M4)
uses JUnit 4.3.1.
I thought that should=
n't stop me so I tried to create plugin that
bundles the JUnit 4.4 jar inst=
ead hoping that eclipse would not depend
on anything that changed between t=
he two versions.

The thing is that I'm really green in the field of eclips=
e-development
and I'm not sure if it doesn't work because the JUnit runner =
is
incompatible with the 4.4 version or if I simply stuffed up my plugin
(t=
hat I struggled with for a whole evening just to realize the day
after that=
 the create-plugin from existing jars works just fine in
eclipse 3.3 but no=
t so well in eclipse 3.4M4.

Has /anyone/ had /any/ success running a /plug=
in/ test that uses a
/junit 4.4/ based runner in /any downloadable version/=
 of eclipse? I
spent way to much time on this already...
